name: Southwestern Pea Soup
keywords: appetizer, frozen peas, garlic, yogurt, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 10-ounce packages frozen peas, defrosted in a sieve under warm running water (reserve 1/2 cup for garnish)
4 medium cloves garlic, smashed and peeled
1/2 cup finely chopped red bell pepper
Scant 3 tablespoons loosely packed cilantro or Italian parsley leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Place the peas in a food processor and process until smooth, stopping from time to time to scrape sides of bowl. Add the yogurt, olive oil, lime juice, garlic and chili powder. Process until smooth.
Scrape mixture into a large metal bowl. Stir in water and salt. Refrigerate until cold. Pour into bowls and pass garnish ingredients separately.
